meanings: Noun 홀[회관/-실](회의·식사·콘서트 등을 위한 큰 방이나 건물) (→city hall, dance hall, guildhall, music hall, town hall)

vlive.korean: (원더풀) 컨벤션 홀에서... (Wonderful) ...in the convention hall. 듣기 View video 컨버전스티비 (CONS TV) : [커먼스쿨]해성국제컨벤션고등학교 ep.1
영혼이 아직 올림픽홀에 있다고요? Your soul is still at Olympic Hall? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 막내의 사생활 18🦊
vlive.english: Your soul is still at Olympic Hall?

vlive.korean: 지금 저기 홀 한 번만 도와주면 안 돼요? Could you please help her in the hall? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 이상형과 존잘남을 동시에 만났을 때, 네 선택은? [크네유] - EP.01
vlive.english: Could you please help her in the hall?

vlive.korean: 아까부터 홀이랑 주방이랑 지금 내가... I've been in the hall and the kitchen all along... 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 이상형과 존잘남을 동시에 만났을 때, 네 선택은? [크네유] - EP.01
vlive.english: I've been in the hall and the kitchen all along...

vlive.korean: 그냥 홀에서 자고 있으면 누가 깨워주겠지 약간... Then I slept in the hall, thinking that somebody would wake me up. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TXT (투모로우바이투게더) ‘TALK X TODAY : Season2 ’ EP.2
vlive.english: Then I slept in the hall, thinking that somebody would wake me up.

examples.korean: the cool, chaste interior of the hall 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 홀의 서늘하고 꾸밈없는 내부 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the cool, chaste interior of the hall Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A solitary light burned dimly in the hall. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 홀에서는 불 하나가 희미하게 빛나고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A solitary light burned dimly in the hall. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The acoustics of the new concert hall are excellent. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 새 콘서트홀의 음향 시설이 아주 훌륭하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The acoustics of the new concert hall are excellent. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Robinson and his cohorts were soon ejected from the hall. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 로빈슨과 그의 지지자들은 곧 그 홀에서 쫓겨났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Robinson and his cohorts were soon ejected from the hall. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The house had a panelled hall and a fine oak stair. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 집에는 벽판으로 장식된 홀과 멋진 오크 계단이 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The house had a panelled hall and a fine oak stair. Add to Wordbook
